Container.Name: munin-server
Container.Description: [b]This container runs the latest version of ubuntu:xenial munin/node/apache.[/b][br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br][br] [b][span style='color: #0088CC;']Volumes:[/span][/b][br] [b]/var/cache/munin/www :[/b] Generated charts from rrd data[br] [b]/var/lib/munin :[/b] Historic rrd data that you'll probably want to keep[br][br] [b][span style='color: #0088CC;']Port Mappings:[/span][/b][br] [b]80 :[/b] Apache port mapped to port 8888[br][br] [b][span style='color: #0088CC;']Variables:[/span][/b][br] [b]ALLOWED_HOSTS :[/b] If intended to monitor this host from an enternal munin server. CIPR notation eg 192.168.1.0/24(class C) or 192.168.0.3/32(single host), default set to allow all to port 4949[br] [b]HOSTNAME :[/b] Name of server as appears in munin reports, defaults to unRAID[br] [b]TZ :[/b] Timezone already being passed by unRAID[br]
Container.Changes: 2016.07.29-1 ------------ INITIAL RELEASE --------------- - Basic schema written from scratch, pending branch and refactor - Stable
